home.description: Manage your activities, participants, and registrations with ease.
home.activitiesDescription: Then, create an activity. You can create multiple activities using the same activity type on different dates. Easy!
home.activityTypesDescription: First, define an activity type. This could be an existing type or a new type of activity you just made up. Congratulations!
home.participantsDescription: Manage participant information and details. Add them, remove them, do whatever you want. Well, not entirely. Be a little bit cautious.
home.registrationsDescription: Finaly, go to the activity and manage the registrations for your activity on that date and time. Just search for the participant and mark him or her as present. If only life itself was this convenient!
